</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These strange masks consist of a thin stone hood and a shimmering purple veil reminiscent of the [pleroma aeon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=11) who first gifted them to mortals in the hope that sharing the means of aeon communication would reduce the misunderstandings and conflicts among mortal civilizations. An _envisioning mask_ covers your entire face, though it doesn't hinder your vision or other senses.
